title: Does a Photograph Show a 'Pro-ISIS Rally' in Michigan? | Snopes.com
htmlTitle: Does a Photograph Show a 'Pro-ISIS Rally' in Michigan? | Snopes.com
snippet: Published Dec 7, 2015. Advertisment: Claim: A photograph depicts a "pro-ISIS rally" held in Dearborn, Michigan, in December 2015. Rating:.
htmlSnippet: Published Dec 7, 2015. Advertisment: Claim: A photograph depicts a "pro-ISIS rally" held in Dearborn, Michigan, in December 2015. Rating:.

metatags.twitter:creator: @snopes
metatags.og:description: A widely circulated image does not depict a "pro-ISIS rally" held in Dearborn, Michigan, but rather an anti-ISIS demonstration.
metatags.twitter:title: Does a Photograph Show a 'Pro-ISIS Rally' in Michigan?
metatags.og:title: Does a Photograph Show a 'Pro-ISIS Rally' in Michigan?
metatags.article:author: Kim LaCapria

title: Dearborn's Anti-ISIS Rally - FactCheck.org
snippet: Dec 18, 2015 ... Q: Was there a pro-ISIS rally in Dearborn, Michigan, on Dec. ... a demonstration in Dearborn, Michigan, 2015-12-05, which flew ISIS flags, ...
htmlSnippet: Dec 18, 2015 ... Q: Was there a pro-ISIS rally in Dearborn, Michigan, on Dec. ... a demonstration in Dearborn, Michigan, 2015-12-05, which flew ISIS flags, ...

metatags.apple-mobile-web-app-title: FactCheck.org - A Project of The Annenberg Public Policy Center
metatags.og:description: Q: Was there a pro-ISIS rally in Dearborn, Michigan, on Dec. 5? A: No. Actually, there was an anti-ISIS rally on Dec. 5 in Dearborn. False information about that rally was spread on social media.  FULL QUESTION Was there a demonstration in Dearborn, Michigan, 2015-12-05, which flew ISIS flags, and Muslim brotherhood flags? FULL ANSWER The Islamic State group, which is also known as the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria or ISIS,
metatags.twitter:creator: @factcheckdotorg
metatags.author: Raymond McCormack
metatags.og:title: Dearborn's Anti-ISIS Rally - FactCheck.org
